"Personalized Shopping Cart" - Develop an AI-powered shopping cart that learns your preferences and recommends products accordingly. This will save time and make the shopping experience more personalized.

"Virtual Try-On" - Create a virtual reality feature that allows you to try on clothes, makeup, and accessories virtually before adding them to your cart. This will eliminate the need for physical try-ons and reduce the number of returns.

"Collaborative Shopping" - Develop a feature that allows you to share your shopping cart with friends and family, so they can see what you're buying and add items to it. This will make it easier to coordinate purchases and reduce the number of separate shopping trips.

"Grocery Delivery" - Create a feature that allows you to order groceries directly from your shopping cart and have them delivered to your doorstep. This will save time and reduce the need for in-store shopping.

"Price Comparison" - Develop a feature that compares prices of the same product from different retailers and displays it in your shopping cart. This will help you make informed purchasing decisions and ensure that you're getting the best deal.
